title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5113.7 - Disciplinary hearings
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5113.7 - Disciplinary hearings

State Regulations

Any disciplinary hearing commenced pursuant to these
regulations shall be conducted substantially in accordance with the provisions
of section
5000.6
of this Subtitle. In the
event of a conflict between that section and these regulations, these
regulations shall control. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
5113.7

Amended by

New

York State Register September 24, 2014/Volume XXXVI, Issue 38, eff. 9/24/2014. State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
